nodes.text: Droq'l was the bartender at Shanko's Hive on Borgo Prime. He had three arms, two eyes centered in the middle of his head, another in the back, and one on top of his bald, blue skull. He gave Zekk his first bounty hunter assignment. The assignment was to capture Fonterrat and discover what became of the cargo of ronik shells the rodent-like creature was supposed to sell for the bartender.
